tidbits.title: Great Wall
tidbits.description: China is home to the Great Wall, an iconic symbol of ancient engineering and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, stretching thousands of kilometers across the country.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: China boasts rich cultural diversity, with 56 recognized ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, languages, art forms, and culinary delights.

tidbits.title: Innovative Technology
tidbits.description: China is at the forefront of technological advancements, with innovations in fields like artificial intelligence, renewable energy, and high-speed railways.
